Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Point>

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Point>
    A simple class to hold a coordinate pair. Updated to include 'equals' and 'compareTo'.
    Version:
    5/29/08
    Author:
    CSC 142

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point()
      Constructs a new Point object with the coordinates (0,0).

      Constructs a new Point object with the specified coordinates.
